channel.title: Hiring - finally got a good process around this
channel.description: Hey guys, we've been doing a lot of hiring lately and it's not something we've always got right in the past! So I've wrote up our lessons leant and how we've finally cracked the process. Hope it's of use to anybody hiring at the moment: https://www.sendowl.com/blog/how-to-hire-people-for-your-startup-or-sme.html

item.title: Hiring - finally got a good process around this
item.dc:creator: george_palmer
item.description:
Hey guys, we’ve been doing a lot of hiring lately and it’s not something we’ve always got right in the past! So I’ve wrote up our lessons leant and how we’ve finally cracked the process. Hope it’s of use to anybody hiring at the moment: https://www.sendowl.com/blog/how-to-hire-people-for-your-startup-or-sme.html
